episodes.title: The Order of the Solar Temple: Mass Suicide, Murder & the Final Transit
episodes.description:
The Order of the Solar Temple didn’t end in belief — it ended in fire.

In Part Two, we uncover how Joseph Di Mambro and Luc Jouret transformed a secretive spiritual movement into one of the most disturbing cult tragedies of the 20th century. As followers were warned of the coming apocalypse, members were told to prepare for “Transit” — a ritual departure from their physical bodies to ascend to the star Sirius.

What followed was a chilling mix of coercive control, financial exploitation, staged supernatural visions, and escalating paranoia. As police investigations closed in and members began to leave, the leaders doubled down — orchestrating a series of events that would result in mass suicide and murder across Switzerland, Canada, and France.

Todays episode is sponsored by WOLF ESCAPE GAMES - get your exclusive discount at www.wolfescapegames.com and use the discount code 'KILLERS' at checkout. 

In this episode, we explore:

The collapse of the Order of the Solar Temple

How fake apparitions and occult theatre kept members compliant

The role of “Transit” in justifying mass death

The warning signs authorities missed

Why this case still haunts cult investigations today

⚠️ Content warning: This episode discusses coercive control, sexual abuse, the exploitation of minors, suicide, and murder.

If you’re interested in cult psychology, true crime documentaries, or cases like Jonestown, Heaven’s Gate, and WACO, this is one you won’t forget.

👑 Hosted by Cheryl Hole and Nikki Druce.

Got a theory? Been lost in a rabbit hole? We want to hear from YOU! Email killerscultsqueens@gmail.com to get in touch, or DM us @killerscultsqueens on Instagram. And follow Cheryl @cheryldragqueen and Nikki Druce @nikkimacabrelondon.

episodes.title: Inside the Order of the Solar Temple: The Deadly Cult of Joseph Di Mambro & Luc Jouret
episodes.description: A shining path to cosmic enlightenment… or a deadly descent into madness? This week on Killers, Cults & Queens, Nikki Druce and Cheryl The Queen investigate the Order of the Solar Temple, one of the most infamous cults of the 20th century. Founded by Joseph Di Mambro and Luc Jouret, the group claimed sacred connections to the Knights Templar and promised its followers salvation when the apocalypse arrived. Instead, members were subjected to manipulation, sexual “healing” rituals, staged supernatural events, and a terrifying ideology — all of which led to international tragedy. In Part One, we uncover: ✨ Why people are drawn to charismatic cult leaders ✨ How spirituality and control became dangerously intertwined ✨ The role the Waco Siege played in pushing the cult underground ✨ The early warning signs of the mass deaths to come Dive into the chilling psychology behind cult belief, and prepare yourself for Part Two… where the Solar Temple’s darkest secrets ignite into unimaginable horror. If you love true crime, dark tourism, occult history, or spooky storytelling with a camp twist — you’re in the right place. If you’re interested in more true crime deep dives, hit subscribe and ring the bell to stay updated. 🎧 New episodes of Killers, Cults & Queens every week — hit subscribe and join us for more true crime, cults, and creepy tales. 👑 Hosted by Cheryl Hole and Nikki Druce. Got a theory? Been lost in a rabbit hole? We want to hear from YOU! Email killerscultsqueens@gmail.com to get in touch, or DM us @killerscultsqueens on Instagram. And follow Cheryl @cheryldragqueen and Nikki Druce @nikkimacabrelondon. episodes.title: The Spooky Sleepover: Countdown of the Cults LIVE at CrimeCon UK 2025 with Eleanor Neale
episodes.description: This week on Spooky Sleepover, we're coming to you LIVE from CrimeCon with true crime YouTube star Eleanor Neale! Join us as we count down some of the deadliest, most chilling cults in history... including the ones that still haunt us today. Plus, discover a so-called "community" that's still active... and might just be recruiting. Could you be part of it? We had a great time recording with Eleanor at CrimeCon2025. Her section on the Twin Flame Universe was incredibly interesting. We reached out to the Twin Flame Universe for comment, and we just wanted to share their responses to some of the issues raised. Jeff and Shaleia want to make it clear that they do not condone or encourage any illegal behaviour and have said that there have never been any criminal charges or evidence of criminal wrongdoing against Twin Flames Universe, Jeff and/or Shaleia. In response to the suggestion that the TFU encourages stalking and harassment, they told us that they communicate frequently in Twin Flame Ascension School about the importance of having personal boundaries and honouring the boundaries of others however, they have said they cannot control the actions of others. In response to the allegation that treatment at the TFU culminated in a former member taking their own life, they said that this was suggestion was incorrect. They said a member of the public who was already under medical care registered online for a free consultation with the Mind Alignment Process (MAP) - a separate company also owned by Jeff Divine - but never attended it. Sadly, this individual later died by suicide. MAP practitioners make it clear they are not medical professionals, and their services are not a substitute for therapy or medical care. On the allegation that The TFU encourages members to transition into a different gender they told us that they never encourage any of their members to partake in any discussions or decisions that they are not comfortable with or that are not directly expressed by the students themselves. They concluded by saying that TFU is always respectful and conscientious of people’s individual choices and identities, and that their community is open and unapologetically supportive of all LGBTQ+ members. This episode contains reference to and discussion of coercive control, please take care when listening. If you have been affected by any of the themes in this episode, please consider contacting the following resources: Refuge: 0808 2000 247 (also have online chat) Women's Aid: https://chat.womensaid.org.uk/ The Samaritans helpline: 116 123 Confidential Emotional Support Line: 01708 765200 Hope Not Hate: 020 7952 118 Exit UK: 0800 999 1945 Safeline national male survivor helpline: 0808 800 5005 Sexual Assault Support Line: 01708 765200 Sane mental health line: 0300 304 7000

episodes.title: Was Heaven’s Gate the Deadliest UFO Cult in History?
episodes.description: This week on Killers, Cults and Queens Nikki and Cheryl go back to their millennial roots to learn about the deadliest UFO cult in history. Who were the real figures behind Ti and Do? Were the cult members brainwashed, or willing participants? And what would become of Ti and Do's kingdom? Join us as we uncover the shocking truth behind this infamous mass suicide, the beliefs that led to it, and the dark legacy it left behind. Got a theory? Been lost in a rabbit hole? episodes.title: The Spooky Sleepover: Is the next Pope going to a Liverpudlian?!
episodes.description: This week on The Spooky Sleepover, the special bonus episode of Killers, Cults and Queens, Nikki, Cheryl and the gang dive back into the dramatic downfall of Ruby Franke, Jodi Hildebrandt and the now-infamous YouTube channel 8 Passengers. But that’s not all! In Rabbit Holes of the Week, things get wild with a potentially catastrophic shipwreck lurking in the Thames, Lola Young’s rocky moment on the Coachella stage, and the question no one saw coming... could the next Pope be from Liverpool!? episodes.title: The Spooky Sleepover: Inside the Waco Siege - Hostage Negotiator Jim Alvarez's Untold Insights on Trust, Tactics, and Tragedy
episodes.description: Get ready for a gripping episode as we sit down with Dr. Jim Alvarez, the legendary hostage negotiator who’s handled some of the world’s most intense and high-stakes situations. From his days as a towering 6'5" NYPD negotiator to analyzing the infamous Waco Siege, Jim takes us behind the scenes like never before. In this explosive episode, you'll discover: The real reasons the Waco Siege spiraled into a fiery tragedy—and how it could have been avoided. Shocking insider details about the FBI’s tactics, from broadcasting rabbit screams to running tanks over cars. Why "Operation Showtime" was doomed from the start. Jim’s personal experiences negotiating life-and-death situations, including his wildest hostage stories. Practical tips you can use for handling conflicts, negotiating like a pro, and even surviving a kidnapping (hint: don’t get kidnapped!). Whether you’re a true crime junkie, fascinated by the psychology of negotiation, or just love jaw-dropping stories, this episode delivers it all. 🔗 Follow Dr. Jim Alvarez: Stay updated with his latest talks and insider knowledge. https://jamesralvarez.com/ 🎧 Subscribe Now: Don’t miss our future episodes—hit that follow button! True crime meets expert insight in one unforgettable episode. Tune in now and prepare to be hooked!

episodes.title: The Waco Siege: Inside the Branch Davidians' Deadly Standoff
episodes.description: The Waco Siege: Unraveling the Branch Davidians and David Koresh’s Deadly Prophecy 🔥 Join Nikki and Cheryl as they take a deep dive into one of the most infamous cult stand-offs in American history—the Waco Sieg. In this episode, we travel back to Waco, Texas, where the self-proclaimed "sinful messiah", David Koresh (formerly Vernon Wayne Howell—yes, we’re looking at you, VERNIE 👀), took control of the Branch Davidians. What started as a religious community 🙏 quickly spiralled into chaos, leading to a catastrophic 51-day standoff ⏳ with nearly 1,000 FBI and ATF agents 🚔. Koresh had prophesied his own death at Mount Carmel but little did he know, he would trigger a deadly siege that claimed dozens of lives , shocking the world 🌎. Tune in as we uncover the events leading up to the Waco disaster, the controversial role of law enforcement 🚨, and how a twisted prophecy fuelled one of the deadliest confrontations in modern U.S. history. This episode is not suitable for listeners under the age of 18. It contains distressing details of sexual and physical abuse, including abuse against children. Listener discretion is strongly advised. Got a theory? Been lost in a rabbit hole? We want to hear from YOU! Email queens@global.com to get in touch, or DM us @killerscultsqueens on Instagram. episodes.title: The Spooky Sleepover: Tammy Faye, Drag Queens, and Cult Icons: Behind the Glamour with Fenton Bailey
episodes.description: Get ready for an unforgettable episode of Killers, Cults, and Queens! Nikki Druce and Cheryl welcome the legendary Fenton Bailey—co-creator of RuPaul’s Drag Race, celebrated documentarian, and TV pioneer. Together, they delve into the fascinating world of Tammy Faye Bakker, her impact on the LGBTQ+ community, and her role as a trailblazer in television history. 🎙️ What’s Inside This Episode: The story behind Tammy Faye Bakker’s groundbreaking activism and unique drag-like persona. How Fenton’s iconic documentary, The Eyes of Tammy Faye, shaped her legacy. Behind-the-scenes insights into the creation of RuPaul’s Drag Race and its global influence. Tammy’s connection to drag culture and her enduring message of inclusivity and love. Exclusive details about the upcoming RuPaul’s DragCon and a special discount for listeners! 💄 Why You’ll Love This Episode: This is more than just a podcast episode—it’s a tribute to a true cultural icon. Whether you’re a fan of Drag Race, Tammy Faye, or the art of storytelling, you’ll leave inspired by Fenton’s insights and passion. ✨ Don’t Miss Out: Use code CHERYL10 for 10% off your tickets to RuPaul’s DragCon on January 10-11, 2024. Get your tickets at rupaulsdragcon.com ! 🎧 Listen Now: Available on Globalplayer.com , or wherever you get your podcasts. Don’t forget to follow us on Instagram at @killerscultqueens for behind-the-scenes updates. 📩 Let’s Connect: Have a question or comment? Email us at queens@global.com. 🖤 Killers, Cults, and Queens: Bringing you glamour, grit, and iconic stories every week. Subscribe now and leave a review!

episodes.title: The Rise and Fall of Jim and Tammy Faye Bakker: Scandal, Faith, and Fraud
episodes.description: 📺 Rise and Fall of Jim and Tammy Faye Bakker: Televangelism, Scandal, and a LGBTQIA+ Legacy 🌈 Cauliflower's fluffy and cabbages are green 🥦, but this week, we're diving deep into one of America's biggest televangelism scandals! Nikki and Cheryl explore the meteoric rise and shocking fall of Jim and Tammy Faye Bakker's Praise The Lord (PTL) Network ✝️. What began as a mission to spread the gospel worldwide unraveled into a notorious sex and financial fraud scandal that rocked American televangelism. Join us as we uncover the details of the scandal, the groundbreaking event that made Tammy Faye Bakker an LGBTQIA+ icon—endorsed by none other than RuPaul 👑—and the shocking secrets behind the PTL empire. Did someone really get a facelift 💉 with PTL donations? Buckle up, because Nikki and Cheryl are ready to reveal it all! 🎙️🕵️‍♀️

episodes.title: The Bizarre World of 'Queen' Romana Didulo and her Canadian QAnon Kingdom
episodes.description: The Queen of Canada… or Alien Leader? Exploring Romana Didulo & QAnon Princess, look out the window... and welcome to CANADA! Just in time for Kamala Harris vs Donald Trump we're going on a QAnon journey. This week on Killers, Cults and Queens, Cheryl takes us deep into the wildest conspiracy theory yet: the bizarre world of Romana Didulo—the self-proclaimed Queen of Canada (and the world!). 👑 Is she really an alien queen sent to heal the needy in her mysterious med beds? Or just another figure in the QAnon movement? Join Nikki and Cheryl as they unravel the truth behind QAnon, the strange obsession with adrenochrome, and Romana Didulo’s outrageous claims. If you hear us mix up Ramona and Romana, no you didn’t! 😉 Dive into this rabbit hole with us to uncover the secrets and shocking theories. Don’t miss this mind-bending episode of Killers, Cults and Queens—stream now! 🎙️ This episode is not suitable for listeners under the age of 18, and is not intended for all audiences. episodes.title: The dark rise of Jim Jones and the road to Jonestown
episodes.description: Nikki Druce and Cheryl are BACK, and they're back with a bang. This week on Killers, Cults and Queens, Nikki and Chez are headed to Guyana to experience one of the worst cults of all time... The People's Temple. How did a preacher from humble beginnings convince hundreds of people to up and leave their lives all over the world for the now infamous Jonestown? And what were the events leading up to the horrific mass suicide of almost 1,000 people? Nikki and Chez are going to find out. This episode is not suitable for listeners under the age of 18. episodes.title: Christmas Special, the bizarre case of the Love Has Won cult
episodes.description: Ho ho ho! Christmas has come early thanks to Cheryl and Nikki Druce. High on the spirit of crimbo, they present an unreleased episode from season one… the pilot! So get in, we’re heading back 7 months to learn about the crazy Love Has Won cult. A tale of mother and father gods, colloidal silver and glitter covered desiccated corpses… what could be more festive than that… But who was mother god, and how did a potentially well intentioned community turn into a police raid that went viral? Cheryl and Nikki are going to find out. Expect baby Nikki and Chez, tails of swingers hotels and a shocking discovery. This episode contains graphic details of violence, mental and physical abuse. This episode also comes with a trigger warning for those who are currently living with or recovering from an eating disorder. It is not intended for all audiences. episodes.title: The worst cult you’ve probably never heard of, The Ant Hill Kids
episodes.description: Nikki Druce and Cheryl are travelling to Canada to meet the WORST cult leader to have ever existed. After growing up in the stereotypical cult leader way (being told he was really smart and eventually dropping out of school), Roch Theriault spent his early 20s hell bent on creating a world for himself, one that he could control with all of his might… containing the most disturbing details Nikki and Cheryl have ever heard, they’re about to find that this ‘equalism’ community was not all that it seemed. Expect earth shattering revelations, horrific living conditions, and the story of one very very brave woman. This episode contains graphic details of violence, mental and physical abuse, including abuse against children and babies. It is not intended for all audiences. episodes.title: The horrific sex cult inside NXIVM
episodes.description: Cheryl and Nikki Druce are heading down a road they’ve never been before to the heinous sex cult Dominus Obsequious Sororium of NXIVM. Promoted as a self improvement community, NXIVM was an MLM of gargantuan proportions, allegedly giving advice to The Bronfman Sisters and even Richard Branson… but no one could have guessed the cruel underside ruled by sick leader Keith ‘Vanguard’ Raniere and Smallville actress Alison Mack. Who was Keith Reniere, and how did a self improvement company lead to the mutilation of almost a dozen women? Cheryl and Nikki are going to find out. Expect modern day cult behaviour, a very confused Chez, and some SERIOUSLY messed up behaviour. This episode contains graphic details of violence, mental and physical abuse. This episode also comes with a trigger warning for those who are currently living with or recovering from an eating disorder. It is not intended for all audiences. episodes.title: The horrific crimes of The Manson Family cult - Part 2
episodes.description: Cheryl and Nikki Druce are back to uncover the horrendous crimes of The Manson Family Cult. Picking straight back up where we left off, Cheryl and Nikki arrive at Spahn Ranch, where Charles is just about to take his love for music to a whole new level… How did a chance meeting with a Beach Boy and the classic Beatles track Helter Skelter spiral into the brutal murders of at least seven innocent people, and how did Charles manipulate his followers to do the unthinkable? Cheryl and Nikki are about to find out. Expect the house guests from hell, places that REALLY shouldn’t be used as a toilet, and the end of one of the most awful manipulators in history. This episode contains graphic details of violence and murder, including violence against a heavily pregnant woman and is not intended for all audiences. Listener discretion is strongly advised. episodes.title: Charles Manson, the man behind the horrific Manson Family Cult - Part 1
episodes.description: Cheryl and Nikki Druce are deep diving into the childhood of one of the most infamous cult leaders of modern day history, Charles Manson. After a rocky childhood spending most of his years in and out of schools for troubled teens and maximum security prisons, Charles heads to Berkeley to find a family of his own… Was Charles destined for the horrible fate he was racing towards, or was the nightmare ahead a product of his own making? Cheryl and Nikki are going to find out. Expect tales of the most delinquent teen of all time, an enormous amount of car stealing, and LSD fuelled orgies. This episode contains graphic details of violence and murder, and is not intended for all audiences.
